title: Support Tickets
body: Does it usually take riot over 10 hours to answer a support ticket?

replies.body: Hello i havet left a support ticket to riot last Saturday on my account on the Russian region but I still haven't got an answer. I submitted a ticket on this account as well regarding my ticket on my other account on the Russian server. It has been 4 days since I submitted my first ticket and I still haven't got an answer so I'm wondering how long it will take for riot to answer my submission? Its really frustrating not even getting an answer or anything at all in as long as 4 days. usually I get answer within 24 hours from riot support but now it just feels like my ticket has been thrown down the trash bin. please respond and help me.
It usually doesn't take too long, but our volume has increased quite a bit for most teams over the last few days.  Toss me your ticket number, and I can check on the status for you!
31926967 Any help would be a god send. I have had this account for a lonngg time.

Got it!  I've confirmed it's been received and the correct form was filled out specifically for recovery.  Our account team has a higher volume then normal right now.  Since your ticket was submitted yesterday, a specialist should be able to reach out sooner!
Thenk you for your help but I still haven't gotten any response is this still normal?
